prompt: I am your commanding officer, you are to report any progress to me. Do you understand?
name: General Boris Volkov

prompt: Hello Ilya, I am Yelena Smirnova. I am the best record keeper in the USSR on the occult and otherworldly. Its a pleasure to work with you.
name: Yelena Smirnova

prompt: Greetings. I am Father Alexei, I have been brought on to your project as a spiritual advisor. I trust you are moving forward cautiously and in the light of god.
leftChoiceText: As long as you don't get in the way
name: Father Alexei

prompt: I've been thinking that we should put some energy into researching Molybdomancy. What do you think?
leftChoiceText: Perhaps we should focus on something else
name: Yelena Smirnova

prompt: The locals have caught wind of our program. What should we do?
rightChoiceText: Send Father Alexei to calm them
name: General Boris Volkov

prompt: I'm afriad that we may be straying too far from the light of god
name: Father Alexei
